member.name: T:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1
member.summary: Provides the core logic for implementing a manual-reset or .

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._continuation
member.summary: The callback to invoke when the operation completes if was called before the operation completed, or if the operation completed before a callback was supplied, or null if a callback hasn't yet been provided and the operation hasn't yet completed.

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._continuationState
member.summary: State to pass to .

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._executionContext
member.summary: to flow to the callback, or null if no flowing is required.

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._capturedContext
member.summary: A "captured" or with which to invoke the callback, or null if no special context is required.

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._completed
member.summary: Whether the current operation has completed.

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._result
member.summary: The result with which the operation succeeded, or the default value if it hasn't yet completed or failed.

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._error
member.summary: The exception with which the operation failed, or null if it hasn't yet completed or completed successfully.

member.name: F:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1._version
member.summary: The current version of this value, used to help prevent misuse.

member.name: P:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.RunContinuationsAsynchronously
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to force continuations to run asynchronously.
member.remarks: Continuations may run asynchronously if this is false, but they'll never run synchronously if this is true.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.Reset
member.summary: Resets to prepare for the next operation.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.SetResult(`0)
member.summary: Completes with a successful result.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.SetException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Complets with an error.

member.name: P:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.Version
member.summary: Gets the operation version.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.GetStatus(System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets the status of the operation.
member.param: Opaque value that was provided to the 's constructor.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.GetResult(System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets the result of the operation.
member.param: Opaque value that was provided to the 's constructor.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.OnCompleted(System.Action{System.Object},System.Object,System.Int16,System.Threading.Tasks.Sources.ValueTaskSourceOnCompletedFlags)
member.summary: Schedules the continuation action for this operation.
member.param: The continuation to invoke when the operation has completed.
The state object to pass to when it's invoked.
Opaque value that was provided to the 's constructor.
The flags describing the behavior of the continuation.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.ValidateToken(System.Int16)
member.summary: Ensures that the specified token matches the current version.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.SignalCompletion
member.summary: Signals that the operation has completed. Invoked after the result or error has been set.

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Internal.ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore`1.InvokeContinuation
member.summary: Invokes the continuation with the appropriate captured context / scheduler. This assumes that if is not null we're already running within that .

member.summary: Utility methods for boxing value types efficiently, in particular for avoid boxes and capture contexts in callbacks

member.summary: Gets an instance from the pool if possible

member.summary: Puts an instance back into the pool

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Pool.Box``1(``0@)
member.summary: Wraps a value-type into a boxed instance, using an object pool; consider using value-tuples in particular

member.name: M:PooledAwait.Pool.UnboxAndReturn``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Unwraps a value-type from a boxed instance and recycles the instance, which should not be touched again
